channel.title: Comments on: Review: The Divine Move (Movie)

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I agree that the movie certainly had its shortcomings in different spots, but as far as an attempt at a go fused action movie goes, I thought it did a nice job and hope that it may inspire more go related movies!
item.content:encoded: I agree that the movie certainly had its shortcomings in different spots, but as far as an attempt at a go fused action movie goes, I thought it did a nice job and hope that it may inspire more go related movies!

item.title: By: Eyecatcher
item.dc:creator: Eyecatcher
item.description: Nice review, see a similar, but (just) a tiny bit more negative... although my opinion is not totally negative... i did enjoy the movie... but i near the end show-Down i thought that all was a bit too fast and simple... story lacks a bit of depth and while some scenes are rich of flavour (the open gambling room ... some outside scenes) many indoor scenes felt a bit dry... for example the short "love story" scene... i think the movie could have needed a bit more extra money... but yes, i would see it again, although i expected a bit more :)))
item.content:encoded: Nice review, see a similar, but (just) a tiny bit more negative… although my opinion is not totally negative… i did enjoy the movie… but i near the end show-Down i thought that all was a bit too fast and simple… story lacks a bit of depth and while some scenes are rich of flavour (the open gambling room … some outside scenes) many indoor scenes felt a bit dry… for example the short “love story” scene… i think the movie could have needed a bit more extra money… but yes, i would see it again, although i expected a bit more :)))
